name: 范育成
objective: 此課程主要目標在學習VLSI系統架構設計，使學生以宏觀的系統架構觀念設計超大型積體電路。其課程內容包含如下： 1、VLSI架構設計原理 2、各式積體電路架構介紹 3、運算處理單元架構設計 4、多媒體架構實例 5、高速及高效能的數位積體電路架夠 6、專題研究
schedule:
1. Basic Design Skills
2. Introduction to digital signal processing systems
3. Iteration bound
4. Pipeline and parallel processing
5. Retiming
6. Unfolding
7. Folding
8. Systolic array architecture
9. Scheduling and resource allocation
10. Processing element design
11. Case study
materials:
1. 上課講義
2.”VLSI Digital Signal Processing Systems: Design and
Implementation,” by Keshab K. Parhi
3.”DSP Integrated Circuits (Academic Press Series in
Engineering),” by Lars Wanhammar
